product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag
long_description: The streamlined Sea To Summit Big River dry bag will safely store your belongings no matter where you paddle. 420-denier nylon with a thermoplastic urethane laminate is durable and completely waterproof. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. Durable buckle with D-ring attachment point secures roll top and can be secured to a pack or kayak. Hypalon lash loops are welded on for additional strength and provide a secure attachment point. Oval shape resists rolling when laid on its side. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The streamlined Sea To Summit Big River dry bag will safely store your belongings no matter where you paddle.
